title: group role
description: A set of user interface objects which are not intended to be included in a page summary or table of contents by assistive technologies.

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the group role
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware that elements are within a group

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the group name if it has a group name
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of the name of group

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the boundaries of the group
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware when they enter and exit a group
